title: Senior Frontend Developer - React
job_description: Join our engineering team to build the next generation of content management tools. You'll work on cutting-edge React applications, develop innovative user interfaces, and collaborate with a talented team of developers and designers. This role offers the opportunity to shape the future of digital content experiences.
requirements: 5+ years React experience, TypeScript proficiency, Modern frontend tooling (Vite, Webpack), API integration experience, Git version control, Agile development experience
benefits: Competitive salary, Health/dental/vision insurance, 401k with matching, Flexible PTO, Remote work options, Professional development budget, Modern equipment provided
